text: Sir Thomas Stanley (1532/33–1576), of Winwick, Lancashire and Tong, Shropshire, was an English politician. He was a Member (MP) of the Parliament of England for Lancashire in April 1554, November 1554 and 1555. His tomb is in St Bartholomew's Church at Tong. ==References== Category:1530s births Category:1576 deaths Category:Members of the Parliament of England (pre-1707) for Lancashire Category:People from Shropshire Category:English MPs 1554 Category:English MPs 1554–1555 Category:English MPs 1555
title: Thomas Stanley (Lancashire MP, died 1576)
